references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the core 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) method that the current paper builds upon for its 3D environmental mapping.
This paper provides the fundamental Structure from Motion (SfM) technique used for initializing the 3D Gaussian representation in the current work.
This paper introduces the denoised DINOv2 features, crucial for robust feature extraction and outlier identification in the proposed 3DGM framework.

references.paper_title: Dinov2: Learning robust visual features without supervision
references.reason: This paper provides the DINOv2 model, which is a key component for extracting robust and discriminative visual features used in the 3DGM framework.

references.paper_title: Ithaca365: Dataset and driving perception under repeated and challenging weather conditions
references.reason: This paper introduces the Ithaca365 dataset, a crucial source of real-world multitraverse driving data used for the Mapverse benchmark in evaluating the proposed method.
